name: Enjoy food like local people in Danang
description: Do you want to try some unique food as a local people in Da Nang city? Join me and I will take you to some places where you can get the best popular food in my city. It's not just a food tour, it is also a chance for you to know more about the cooking habit of Danang people, the local market and especially the most beautiful street in my city - Bach Dang street.
